org.cornutum.tcases.util

Interface Notifier

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ModelConditionNotifier, RequestCaseConditionNotifier, TestCaseConditionNotifier

    public interface Notifier
    Reports conditions found during execution

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void error(String[] location, String reason, String resolution)
      Reports an error that would have resulted in inconsistent or infeasible results.
      static Notifier ignore()
      Returns a Notifier that ignores all conditions.
      static Notifier log(org.slf4j.Logger logger)
      Returns a Notifier that logs all conditions, using the given Logger.
      default String messageFor(String[] location, String reason, String resolution)
      Returns a message for the given condition arguments.
      void warn(String[] location, String reason)
      Reports a condition that will affect processing results

    • Method Detail

      • warn

        void warn(String[] location,
          String reason)
        Reports a condition that will affect processing results
        Parameters:
        location - The path to the location of the condition
        reason - A description of the condition

      • error

        void error(String[] location,
           String reason,
           String resolution)
        Reports an error that would have resulted in inconsistent or infeasible results.
        Parameters:
        location - The path to the location of the error
        reason - A description of the problem
        resolution - A description of how the problem was resolved

      • messageFor

        default String messageFor(String[] location,
                          String reason,
                          String resolution)
        Returns a message for the given condition arguments.

      • ignore

        static Notifier ignore()
        Returns a Notifier that ignores all conditions.

      • log

        static Notifier log(org.slf4j.Logger logger)
        Returns a Notifier that logs all conditions, using the given Logger.
